mapper.insert: insert into shows (title, period, time, venue, admission, price, host, management, inquiry) values (#{title}, #{period}, #{time}, #{venue}, #{admission}, #{price}, #{host}, #{management}, #{inquiry})
mapper.select: select show_num showNum, title, period, time, venue, admission, price, host, management, inquiry from shows
select show_num showNum, title, period, time, venue, admission, price, host, management, inquiry from shows where show_num like #{showNum}
mapper.update: update shows set title = #{title}, period = #{period}, time = #{time}, venue = #{venue}, admission = #{admission}, price = #{price}, host = #{host}, management = #{management}, inquiry = #{inquiry} where show_num like #{showNum}
mapper.delete: delete from shows where show_num like #{showNum}
